channel.title: [525] players cant logon
channel.description:
I know how to portforward, so dont leave comments about that..
I just cant figure out how other players cant connect.. I recently changed to a 525 server from my 317.. and now, all of a sudden it gives them js5connect..
I cant find which document in my source i change the ip players need to use to connect, can anyone gimme a hint?

item.title: [525] players cant logon

Taharok:

Your other topic has been deleted. Please don’t make multiple topics for one question.

Cause I dont know if it’s the client or server?

item.title: [525] players cant logon

item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

I searched in both
client.java
and
client2.java

and it gave me nothing for “localhost” or “127.0.0.1” or “0.0.0.0”
( I changed to my ip b4 )

Read full topic

item.title: [525] players cant logon
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Does your client that you give them go to your server’s ip? It might only work for you because it is still at 127.0.0.1 or localhost. You don’t change anything in your source for people to connect. You only change things in your client’s files. Go into client.java and search for “127.0.0.1” or “localhost” and change to your server’s ip.

Read full topic
